content: {"locationId": "1042", "organizationId": "919", "name": "Convivium Urban Farmstead", "address1": "2811 Jackson Street", "address2": null, "city": "Dubuque", "state": "IA", "zipCode": "52001", "country": null, "phone": "563-557-2900", "phoneExt": null, "website": "convivium-dbq.com", "latitude": "42.5234305", "longitude": "-90.6774344", "foodPrograms": "Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Dubuque", "languages": "", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "The mission of Convivium Urban Farmstead is to improve life through food. We accomplish our mission through classes, demonstrations, and experiences that use food to foster connection to ourselves, our community and our environment. We also provide free meals, as well as tools and education about healthy food choices, to children and adults who are struggling with food access, especially those living in the North End.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Brian Bunten", "contactPhone": "563-557-2900", "contactEmail": null, "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Prepared Food / Grab and Go", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 14, "regionName": "River Bend Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "27f2b82c-b145-46d8-a570-4c990f38833b.png", "website": "http://riverbendfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Thursday 11:00 AM-1:00 PM (We start handing out meals at 11, until supplies last.)", "Thursday 2:00 PM-4:00 PM (There are casseroles available at RESOURCES UNITE (1900 JFK Rd.) from 2-4 pm.)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
